summary: Adds a lore friendly players House/Keep, near Rorikstead(already reveled on your map) Follower Friendly.
descriptionHtml:
Adds a “lore friendly” players House/Keep, near Rorikstead(already reveled on your map). Thanks to some great video tutorials and some free time. This Mod is now Follower friendly. 

This small/balanced player\'s Keep includes;
Main floor has a kitchen and alchemy table. Plenty of storage.
Basement has smithy, including smelter and tanning rack. 
2nd floor is the player\'s bedroom with plenty of storage and display options. 
3rd floor is player\'s treasury room! Tons of storage, shelf space, tables, and enchanting table. 

v3.0 adds a stable for your horse! 

Be sure to post pictures of your character hanging out at the Keep. 

I hope you Enjoy this small but very detailed mod. Cheers. 

PS. All Screenshot where taken with Sharpshooter8\'s Graphic mod. Awesome work sharpshooter8  

http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/15105
author: Mikem249
